
# Research Internships and Visiting Positions

```{r internships, results = "asis"}
data_internships <- tibble(
    what = "Doctoral Research Intern – Future of Work Institute",
    when = "October 2025 – February 2026",
    role = "Future of Work Institute, Curtin University",
    where = "Perth, Western Australia",
    details = c("Doctoral research internship under the supervision of Professor Marylène Gagné, focusing on work and organizational psychology research at the Future of Work Institute.")
)

detailed_entries(data_internships, role, when, what, where, details)
```
